metadata.name: Any one of us
metadata.description:
This mod adds (some) of the features of the spy from Team Fortress 2.

The Knife:
Become a dime-a-dozen backstabbing scumbag with the Spy’s iconic butterfly knife. Use it to deal a hefty amount of damage to other mercenaries without them knowing you’re there.

The Invisiwatch:
Use this device to turn yourself entirely invisible, unlike normal invisibility your items and armor become invisible.

The Spy’s suit:
Wear the spy’s suit to adopt his sounds from Team Fortress 2.

TODO:
In the future I aim to add disguising and the electro sapper
